attributes.action: Don’t make it harder for single men to see their entertainment of choice just because people who are too stupid to where a condom are whinging
attributes.additional_details:
The Prime Minster wants to make it harder to see porn by forcing more filters on us. This is because he is a breeder and puts the interest of his, and others, non-tax paying juniors before those who just want to relax.
The Porn Industry, in Britain and across the world brings joy to million and a decent income to thousands.
It is the parents responsibility to keep children safe, by not allowing them un supervised on the internet, not the rest of us to compromise
